post.body: i'm going to the sixers cavs game next wednesday!
yep! Can't wait. Want some duck meat?
that's who we worked with, great guy
and I are teaching my cousin trav about twitter
a cooler that I checked! delta charges $15 to check just one bag. ridiculous!
thanks for coming up to the city. need to hang out other than formal settings sometime
watching it too
shows that we're a team that is acting together :)
when am i getting my walk-through? :)
no kidding
yeah, right
jealous you got to see neil young. did he play any of his old originals? heart of gold or old man? saw him in philly last year
you actually got the sebring? Good man
why do people always like to twitter when they're working late? to show off? oh btw, it's 3am and i'm still working!
scrribd throws adsense ads in between pages in their doc viewer, clever
Making dave drive tonight
amazing mugshot http://www.cnn.com/2008/CRIME/12/01/hudson.arrest/index.html
JJ redick is actualy starting games for the Magic
RT @firstround NothingToSay: Philadelphia Area Job Openings http://tinyurl.com/6f3f2u
On the way to the ashville airport
mo williams on the cavaliers has a tattoo that says "NBA, Never Broke Again"
two of my little cousins (who are georgia fans) just walked in with GA jerseys and in sync yelled "wait till next year!". must convert them
NFL players should not be allowed in nightclubs. http://sportsillustrated.cnn.com/2008/football/nfl/11/29/burress.giants.ap/index.html
go ga tech! defeated georgia for the first time in 7 years. the whole fam is going nuts, i think about 20 alumni were at our house this week
i do not like LinkedIn's new search results page. while still not "smart", the old one was much more comprehensive
At the Carolina Smokehouse in Cashiers, NC
did wal-mart change its logo?
So. Full. Smores time around the bonfire
Heading to newark to go to north carolina
the buzz surrounding the cav's (i.e. lebron) game tonight in nyc is amazing...
Remember that seqouia rule abt fining the partner if they're late to a meeting with an entrepreneur? I like that rule
Had a meeting event an hour earlier than supposed to, creating a free one hour. Got more done than any hour ever.
Google is taking over my life. Using google maps blackberry app abt 10 times a day in nyc
good catching up with @cameronjohnson
the knicks only have 6 players now. if they need me to suit up, i will
In nyc
Just got some temp office space at Sunshine Suites on lafayette. Very cool spot. Thanks @dherman76
awesome new ad campaign, http://bewareofthedoghouse.com/videoPage.aspx
duck hunting in arkansas this weekend with @jackpabraham
Our landords are Tom and Anthony, so they named their company T and A industries. Amazing
McGehhe*
Going to McGee, Arkansas to eat lunch at a catfish spot
Just practiced shooting a 12 gauge. Getting the hang of it. There are so many ducks here, thousands
At walmart getting hunting licenses
Guy in front of me, it was his first time on an airplane. He was spoiled for this one. Good service and funny crew
"If u leave any items here, to claim them visit ebay.com/deltapensionfund and you can bid on them. Mention this flight # and get free shippi
Another good one, "if you have any feedback for our crew, please write the comment on a $20 bill"
Flight attendant, "please gather all trash, paper, lehman or aig stock, anything you want to discard, please give it to us"
In atlanta. Haven't flown delta in awhile. When did they add TVs? Very old looking and ugly, but I watched espn the whole flight
Heading to laguardi to fly to arkansas. Flying into little rock, meeting cousin, then driving down to a farm near Dumas
Clearing salary cap room on my rec team to make a run at lebron in 2010
Landed in ATL. Hotlanta! Wish I could go to The Varsity
Just drove by Anne Preselys house, the arkansas anchorwoman who was murdered. Scary
Oh wow. Got out there at 6am, killed our limit of 24 ducks within an hour. Bringing back some serious meet
Getting up tmr mng at 5am to go at it again
Back! We each got a duck or two. That was ridiculous.
really loving sunshine suites. if you need space in NYC but not a full-on office, you should look into it
amazing http://img369.imageshack.us/img369/6012/bailoutyk2.jpg
At McSorely's Ale House for lunch
I always convince myself to get out of bed by saying ill be able take a nap later today, but that never actually happens. Something is fishy
Just bought some canolis from Mikes Bakery for Allie
On MIT's campus
On the train to boston tonight
Meeting at the empire state building. Never been here before. Cool!
pictures from the duck hunting trip in arkansas http://www.flickr.com/photos/natsturner/sets/72157610838288105/
song of the day: The Band - Atlantic City
About to shoot hoops on the wachovia center court
The cavs are incredible
wow, half of right media basically just got fired http://tinyurl.com/5tt583 :)
cavs (oh, and the sixers) game tonight!
They're playing Roadhouse Blues at the restaurant I'm at. Nice!
Heading over to The Spotted Pig for dinner
I use the google maps app on my blackberry more than all other apps combined
At the blue water grill
Wow. That was delicious
At Hill Country for BBQ
I'm in the elevator with two girls. One is no more than 4'10", the other is easily 6'3". Height is an amazing thing
VideoEgg is remarketing me on facebook
And as I say that abt the starbucks location, they're out of my drink. Lol
The google talk blackberry app is really buggy lately
The starbucks at astor place is fantastic. Largest one I've seen, lots of big tables and open room. A luxury in short supply in nyc
fav line to say at steakhouse when asked if I need steak sauce, "well, i certainly hope not"
Good line from waiter after taking order, "okay thank you, everythings on the way"
Just saw an ESPN article reference users twittering abt a certain player
amazing from FRC, http://holiday.firstround.com/ best dancing award from me goes to @monetate @dbrussin
wow http://www.cnn.com/2008/WORLD/americas/12/15/mexico.kidnapping/index.html
Wow its warm today in Philly. Love it
today is feeling like a van morrison kind of day
Going to pick up Allie at the airport!
Great meetings today in nyc despite the snow
Good nytimes article on the fb player Michael Lewis profiled in The Blind Side (great book) http://tinyurl.com/95v3gw
Absolutely love the Blackberry Curve. So I can't play sodoku as easily as on an iphone, and I need to carry and ipod, but that's okay
About to break my rule of not making investments unless I have the time to dedicate: going to short corp bonds, buy $TBT
Haven't been in a cab in over a week, feels weird
Landed in Newark
On the plane, headed back to newark
At IAH. The check-in guy asked the other checkin guy for a cigarette, then proceeded to discuss how his grandmother died of lung cancer!
Oh the glory days. Its so interesting to see where everyone ended up
The Curves interface/software and feel is so much better than the 8830
Going to Buffalo Wild Wings to meet some high school buds
the Orlando Magic are *large*
Getting Luby's with the mom
the cavs win again
great commercial http://tinyurl.com/8cgxj9
Half of the mavericks players, and 4/5 of their starters, have a first name that starts with J
Going to Coldstone
Working on my new phone, getting it setup
